BiocGF 0.0.3

    tokenize a loom file

    gf_tokenize_loom.Rd

    tokenize a loom file

    gf_tokenize_loom(
  loompath,
  output_directory = tempdir(),
  output_prefix = "loomtoks"
)

    Arguments

    loompath

    character(1) path to loom file

    output_directory

    character(1) defaults to tempdir()

    output_prefix

    character(1) defaults to "loomtoks"

    Note

    The python functionality calls for dirname(loompath).

    Examples

    lp = get_panc_loom_path()
gf_tokenize_loom(lp)
#> Dataset({
#>     features: ['input_ids', 'adata_order', 'batch', 'celltype', 'n_counts', 'n_genes', 'n_genes_by_counts', 'obs_names', 'size_factors', 'tech', 'total_counts', 'length'],
#>     num_rows: 16382
#> })
dir(tempdir())
#> [1] "GF_safetensors"   "downlit"          "file122473d2439d" "loomtoks.dataset"
